Objects
Class JWarTerrainObject

java.lang.Object
  Objects.JWarTerrainObject

public class JWarTerrainObject
extends java.lang.Object

Terrain Object is to be used with JBattleField and specifies an object to be placed on the battle terrain

Author:
Schultz
